sentences.en: Finally the country got some much-needed good news.
sentences.cn: 最后该国人民得到了一些他们最需要的好消息。

sentences.en: Salespeople provide much-needed information and education to physicians.
sentences.cn: 销售人员为医生提供亟需的信息和教育。

sentences.en: Similarly, Virgo renders the much-needed stability to the relationship and helps the Pisces in decision making.
sentences.cn: 同样地，处女座给双鱼座带来了稳定的关系，并帮助双鱼座做出决定。
